attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Londoner,s have funded the 2012 Olympic games so you would expect to get proirity tickets or discounts right?Wrong,under european law it is illegal to so even thou the rest of europe has not contributed towards the growing costs of the games.As a London tax payer i want priority ticket allocations and at a discount price for the 2012 Olmypics that i have helped to build.Please sign this petition as i feel this law (from brussles)is discriminating against all of us.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Olympic Games Organising Committee
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
